name: CallHelper
body:
### Welcome to CallHelper
### This is a blacklist call block App
### It's simple, efficient, elegant and easy to use

### When you make your own blacklist, make sure it is encoded in UTF8.

[Example blacklist file is here, about 2M.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DesmondJew/CallHelperDatabase/master/blacklistTestFile)

[Blacklist file format is here, just few bytes.](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DesmondJew/CallHelperDatabase/master/blacklistFormat)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
